dublinCore.dc:title: 117 SRES 4 IS: Fixing the hour of daily meeting of the Senate.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. McConnell submitted the following resolution; which was ordered to lie over, under the rule

form.official-title: Fixing the hour of daily meeting of the Senate.

section.text: That the daily meeting of the Senate be 12:01 p.m. unless otherwise ordered.
